column1: #Text=" Mako says : " Are you all right ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Hate to break up your lovers ' reunion , but Korra 's in trouble .
#Text=" Lin says : " Come on , we have an Avatar to rescue .
#Text=" Lin says : " Your fly was down .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Thanks for catching that .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I urge you to meditate on these visions .
#Text=I believe Aang 's spirit is trying to tell you something .
#Text=" Toph says : " What are you doing here , Aang ?
#Text=I told you , I have this under control .
#Text=" Aang says : " Under normal circumstances , I would n't get involved , but if what those victims said is true , we 're not dealing with a normal criminal .
#Text=" Aang says : " Toph , I 'm forty years old .
#Text=You think you could stop with the nicknames ?
